snippet: London imam Abu Hamza admitted to a U.S. jury on Monday that he provided a satellite phone to Yemeni militants months before they kidnapped Western tourists in 1998 and spoke to their leader just three hours after the hostages were taken....

headline.print_headline: London Imam Claims at U.S. Trial He Tried to Help Yemen Hostages
headline.main: London Imam Claims at U.S. Trial He Tried to Help Yemen Hostages

lead_paragraph: London imam Abu Hamza admitted to a U.S. jury on Monday that he provided a satellite phone to Yemeni militants months before they kidnapped Western tourists in 1998 and spoke to their leader just three hours after the hostages were taken.
